alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 07 at 11:14AM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Southern and central parts of Guam. * WHEN...Until 300 PM ChST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1108 AM ChST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 0.4 and 1.2 inches of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 2 to 4 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. These showers are mostly concentrated over the southern and central parts of Guam, but may spread northward as winds remain light and variable. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Mangilao, Chalan Pago-Ordot, Yona, Hagatna Heights, Talofofo, Sinajana, Inarajan, Asan, Merizo, Piti, Santa Rita and Umatac. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
